question: There are 89 second-graders at Sunny Hill School. 31 of them are girls. On Wednesday, 2 second-grade girls and 7 second-grade boys were absent. How many second grade boys were at Sunny Hill School on Wednesday?
answer:
Of the 89 second graders, 31 are girls, so 89 students - 31 girls = <<89-31=58>>58 boys.
On Wednesday there were 58 boys - 7 absent = <<58-7=51>>51 boys.
#### 51
